formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Solar Elevation: \( E = \arcsin(\sin(\phi) \cdot \sin(\delta) + \cos(\phi) \cdot \cos(\delta) \cdot \cos(h)) \) Solar Azimuth: \( A = \arctan\left(\frac{-\sin(h)}{\tan(\delta) \cdot \cos(\phi) - \sin(\phi) \cdot \cos(h)}\right) \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
